page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content: The parents of the school were asked to fill in a questionnaire about where they were born and how long they had lived on Westlands estate. Out of 192 replies, only 16 Dads and 16 Mums were born in Droitwich. Although the estate was mainly planned as a Birmingham overspill development, less than one-third of the current parent population of the school were actually born in Birmingham. Parents were also asked about their place of work. Out of 157 replies, 96 Dads were unemployed. There were more replies from Mums. Out of 197 replies, 100 worked in Droitwich and 87 did not have a job. Most Dads went to work by car. More than two-thirds of the replies own a car; one-quarter have more than one television set and a third have a video.
